archimate:DataObject.name: SalesProductSpecification
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A SalesProductSpecification specifies the role of CSP for a ProductSpecification sold or rented by the Service Provider. For a SalesProductSpecification the Service Provider might: â€¢ Either only take the order on behalf of another Party (OrderedOnlySalesProdSpec); â€¢ Or take the order and fulfill the product (FulfilledSalesProdSpec).
